contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This regulation establishes standards for the safety and health of National Pension Service workers in accordance with Article 25 of the Occupational Safety and Health Act and Article 13 of the Guidelines for Safety Management of Public Institutions to prevent disasters and accidents. The purpose is to prevent and maintain and promote the safety and health of workers, and to regulate the safety management of facilities and construction projects ordered by the industrial complex, as well as the necessary matters for protecting the life and safety of citizens using the complex's facilities.
